sourcesContent:
import "./ahc.css" export default function Ahc5() { return (

The best way to start a new habit

  • Many people think they lack motivation but what they really lack is clarity
  • Some people wait for their entire lives waiting for the right time to make an improvement
  • Best way to start a new habit — Implementation intention, I will [BEHAVIOR] at [TIME] in [LOCATION]
  • We often say YES to small things because we aren’t clear enough about what we need to be doing instead
  • You often decide what do next based on what you have just finished doing
  • When it comes to building new habits you can use the connectedness of your behaviour to your advantage
  • One of the best ways to build new habits is to identify a current habit you already do each day and stack your new behavior on top of it
  • After [CURRENT HABIT] I will [NEW HABIT]
  • Once you have mastered this basic structure you can create larger stacks by chaining smaller habits together
  • 1st law of behavior change - Make it obvious
  • Strategies like implementation intention and habit stacking are among the most practical ways to create obvious cues for your habits and design a clear plan for when and where to take action
) }
